    vs_3_0
    def c21, 0, -1, 256, -32768
    def c22, 16384, 16384, 0.5, 0
    def c23, 8192, 8192, 0, 0
    def c24, 4096, 4096, 0, 0
    def c25, 0, 4096, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_tangent v1
    dcl_normal v2
    dcl_texcoord o0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord1 o1.xy
    dcl_texcoord2 o2.xy
    dcl_texcoord6 o3
    dcl_texcoord7 o4.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 o5
    dcl_position o6

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    frc r0.x, v2.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, v2.x
    mova a0.x, r0.x
    rcp r0.x, c21[a0.x].y
    mad r0.y, v0.w, c21.z, v0.z
    add r0.y, r0.y, c21.w
    mul r0.y, r0.y, c18.y
    mul r0.zw, c18.x, v0.xyxy
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c11.z
    mad r1.x, c10.z, r0.z, r1.x
    mad r1.x, c12.z, r0.y, r1.x
    add r1.x, r1.x, c13.z
    mov r2.x, c21[a0.x].x
    mad r1.x, r1.x, c20.x, -r2.x
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, r1.x
    mad r1.x, v2.w, c21.z, v2.z
    add r1.x, r1.x, c21.w
    mad r1.y, r1.x, c18.y, -r0.y
    mul r1.x, r1.x, c18.y
    lrp r2.x, r0.x, r1.x, r0.y
    mad r1.z, r1.y, r0.x, r0.y
    mov r0.x, c18.x
    mad r1.xy, v0, r0.x, c19.zwzw
    add o0.xyz, r1, c17
    add r0.xy, r1, c22.z
    mul o1.xy, r0, c19
    mad r0.xy, r0.zwzw, c16, c16.wzzw
    mad o2.xy, r0, c15, c15.wzzw
    mul r1, r0.w, c7
    mad r0, c6, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c8, r2.x, r0
    add r0, r0, c9
    mad r1.xyz, r0, -c4.w, c4
    mul r1.xy, r1, c18.zwzw
    dp3 r2.x, r1, c6
    dp3 r2.y, r1, c7
    dp3 r2.z, r1, c8
    mul r1.xy, c18.y, v1
    mov r1.zw, c21_abs.xyyx
    nrm r3.xyz, r1.zwxw
    nrm r4.xyz, r1.wzyw
    dp3 o3.x, r3, r2
    dp3 o3.y, r4, r2
    mul r1.xyz, r3.zxyw, r4.yzxw
    mad r1.xyz, r3.yzxw, r4.zxyw, -r1
    dp3 o3.z, r1, r2
    mov r2.x, c6.z
    mov r2.y, c7.z
    mov r2.z, c8.z
    dp3 o4.x, r3, r2
    dp3 o4.y, r4, r2
    dp3 o4.z, r1, r2
    mov o3.w, -c21.y
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c3, r0.w, r1
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c14.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c14, r0

// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 B457234B.txt

add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o5, r0

//     mov o6, r0 // Relocated to line 111 with shadertool.py
